category.name: Data Sharing.Multi-Site Collaboration
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TC_legacy_multisite_propagation
preference.preference_description: Activates legacy (CMS) multisite behavior for TcXML mode. Default value is false. Valid Values: * true: force re-propagation for replicated objects at remote site during TcXML multisite import operation and enforce CMS behavior post import. * false: no re-propagation for replicated objects during TcXML multisite import operation, just replication. Skip propagation over replica object, if the object is not checked out by login user.
